org.jgap
Class InvalidConfigurationRuntimeException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.lang.RuntimeException
              org.jgap.InvalidConfigurationRuntimeException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class InvalidConfigurationRuntimeException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException

Similar to InvalidConfigurationException, but in runtime form so it can be thrown from methods that do not throw exceptions.

Author:
Philip Tucker
See Also:
InvalidConfigurationException, Serialized Form
